snippet: Online subscriptions tend to involve no shopping, with merchants sending socks of their own choosing (plain black is a favorite).
abstract: Advertising column; about one dozen online stores within last two years have sprung up offering sock subscriptions, primarily to men; subscriptions tend to involve no shopping, with merchants sending socks of their own choosing; services do little traditional advertising, instead relying on word of mouth and public relations stunts; sales of men's socks online grew 29 percent for 12 months that ended Sept 31.
lead_paragraph: Online subscriptions tend to involve no shopping, with merchants sending socks of their own choosing (plain black is a favorite).

headline.main: Sock-of-the-Month Clubs Rise Online, Bringing Subscriptions to Feet
headline.print_headline: Sock-of-the-Month Clubs Rise Online, Bringing Subscriptions to Feet
